sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_IBH_TSDT WHERE (VALIDATE_IND IS NULL OR VALIDATE_IND='0')
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#

UPDATE T07_IBH_TSDT SET VALIDATE_IND=#validate_ind#
FINN=#finn#
FIRC=#firc#
RLTP=#rltp#
FICT=#fict#
FINC=#finc#
TDRC=#tdrc#
CATP=#catp#
CTAC=#ctac#
TSTM=#tstm#
TICD=#ticd#
TSDR=#tsdr#
CRTP=#crtp#
TRCD=#trcd#
TBNM=#tbnm#
TBIT=#tbit#
TBID=#tbid#
TBNT=#tbnt#
TSTP=#tstp#
TSCT=#tsct#
CRPP=#crpp#
CFIN=#cfin#
CFCT=#cfct#
CFIC=#cfic#
TCNM=#tcnm#
TCIT=#tcit#
TCID=#tcid#
TCAT=#tcat#
TCAC=#tcac#
WHERE REPORTKEY=#reportkey# AND TSDT_SEQNO=$tsdt_seqno$

SELECT T2.REPORTKEY,T2.TICD,T1.CSNM AS OCNM,T1.CTNM,T2.TSTM AS OTDT,T2.FINC,T2.CRAT,T2.CRTP ,T2.TSDR,T2.CRCD,T2.CATI_SEQNO,T2.TSDT_SEQNO,T2.VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_NBH_CTIF T1,T07_NBH_TSDT T2,T07_REPORT T3 WHERE T1.REPORTKEY = T2.REPORTKEY AND T1.CATI_SEQNO = T2.CATI_SEQNO AND T2.REPORTKEY = T3.REPORTKEY
T2.REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
T3.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
T2.TSTM >= #start_dt#
T2.TSTM <= #end_dt#
T2.TICD = #otic#
T2.FINC IN ($finc$)
T2.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
T1.csnm = #ocnm#
substr(T2.TICD,9,8) = #teller#

SELECT COUNT(T2.REPORTKEY) FROM T07_NBH_CTIF T1,T07_NBH_TSDT T2,T07_REPORT T3 WHERE T1.REPORTKEY = T2.REPORTKEY AND T1.CATI_SEQNO = T2.CATI_SEQNO AND T2.REPORTKEY = T3.REPORTKEY
T2.REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
T3.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
T2.TSTM >= #start_dt#
T2.TSTM <= #end_dt#
T2.TICD = #otic#
T2.FINC IN ($finc$)
T2.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
T1.csnm = #ocnm#
substr(T2.TICD,9,8) = #teller#

SELECT T1.REPORTKEY,T1.TICD,T1.CSNM AS OCNM,T1.TSTM AS OTDT,T1.FINC,T1.CRAT,T1.CRTP,T1.TSDR,T1.VALIDATE_IND,T1.TRANS_TYPE FROM V07_TRANS_ERRORS T1 WHERE 1>0
T2.REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
T1.TSTM >= #start_dt#
T1.TSTM <= #end_dt#
T1.TICD = #otic#
T1.FINC IN ($finc$)
T1.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
T1.CSNM = #ocnm#
T1.TRANS_TYPE like #casetype#

SELECT count(1) FROM V07_TRANS_ERRORS T1 WHERE 1>0
T2.REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
T1.TSTM >= #start_dt#
T1.TSTM <= #end_dt#
T1.TICD = #otic#
T1.FINC IN ($finc$)
T1.CSNM = #ocnm#
T1.TRANS_TYPE like #casetype#
UPDATE T07_REPORT SET VALIDATE_IND='1',REPORT_STATUS_CD=#report_status_cd# WHERE REPORTKEY IN ( SELECT REPORTKEY FROM T07_REPORT_CASE WHERE APPLICATION_NUM=#application_num# )

SELECT REPORTKEY,TSDT_SEQNO,OCNM,OTDT,OTCD,OTIC,VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_IBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
OTDT >= #start_time#
OTDT <= #end_time#
OTIC = #otic#
FINC IN ($finc$)
VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
ocnm = #ocnm#
substr(OTIC,9,8) = #teller#

SELECT V.ERR_LOCATION,V.ERRS FROM V07_RECEIPT V,T07_08_FDRC_BH_FCRC R where v.RECEIPTKEY=R.RECEIPTKEY AND V.ERR_SEQNO=R.FCRC_SEQNO
V.REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
R.OTIC = #otic#
UNION SELECT V.ERR_LOCATION,V.ERRS FROM V07_RECEIPT V ,T07_FDCF_FCER R WHERE V.RECEIPTKEY=R.RECEIPTKEY AND V.ERR_SEQNO=R.FCER_SEQNO AND V.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T07_IBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
OTDT >= #start_time#
OTDT <= #end_time#
OTIC = #otic#
FINC IN ($finc$)
VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
ocnm = #ocnm#
substr(OTIC,9,8) = #teller#

UPDATE T07_IBH_TSDT SET FINN=#finn#, FIRC=#firc#, RLTP=#rltp#, FICT=#fict#, FINC=#finc#, TDRC=#tdrc#, CATP=#catp#, CTAC=#ctac#, TSTM=#tstm#, TICD=#ticd#, TSDR=#tsdr#, CRTP=#crtp#, CRAT=$crat$, TRCD=#trcd#, TBNM=#tbnm#, TBIT=#tbit#, TBID=#tbid#, TBNT=#tbnt#, TSTP=#tstp#, TSCT=#tsct#, CRPP=#crpp#, CFIN=#cfin#, CFCT=#cfct#, CFIC=#cfic#, TCNM=#tcnm#, TCIT=#tcit#, TCID=#tcid#, TCAT=#tcat#, TCAC=#tcac#, VALIDATE_IND=#validate_ind# WHERE REPORTKEY=#reportkey# AND TSDT_SEQNO=$tsdt_seqno$
SELECT REPORTKEY,RINM,RICD,IRDT,TSTN FROM T07_IBH_RBIF WHERE REPORTKEY = #value#

SELECT REPORTKEY,TSDT_SEQNO,OCNM,OTDT,OTCD,OTIC,FINN,FIRC,RLTP,FICT,FINC,CATP,CTAC,TBNM,TBIT,TBID,TBNT,TSTM,TICD, TSTP,TSCT,TSDR,TDRC,TRCD,CRPP,CRTP,CRAT,CFIN,CFCT,CFIC,TCNM,TCIT,TCID,TCAT,TCAC,VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_IBH_TSDT WHERE REPORTKEY = #value# ORDER BY TSDT_SEQNO
SELECT A.VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_REPORT A,T07_REPORT_CASE B WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND B.APPLICATION_NUM=#value#

SELECT REPORTKEY,OTCD,TSDT_SEQNO,FINN,FIRC,RLTP,FICT,FINC,CATP,CTAC,TBNM,TBIT,TBID,TBNT,TSTM,TICD,TSTP,TSCT,TSDR,TDRC,TRCD,CRPP,CRTP,CRAT,CFIN,CFCT,CFIC,TCNM,TCIT,TCID,TCAT,TCAC,VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_IBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
TSDT_SEQNO = #tsdt_seqno#

SELECT REPORTKEY,ticd,TSDT_SEQNO,FINN,FIRC,RLTP,FICT,FINC,CATP,CTAC,TBNM,TBIT,TBID,TBNT,TSTM,TICD,TSTP,TSCT,TSDR,TDRC,TRCD,CRPP,CRTP,CRAT,CFIN,CFCT,CFIC,TCNM,TCIT,TCID,TCAT,TCAC,VALIDATE_IND
,CRCD as OTCD FROM T07_NBH_TSDT
,CRCD as OTCD FROM T07_NBH_TSDT_UH
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
TSDT_SEQNO = #tsdt_seqno#
CATI_SEQNO = $cati_seqno$
CRCD = #crcd#

SELECT R.APPLICATION_NUM,D.REPORTKEY,D.DTDT_SEQNO,D.HTDT,D.CSNM,D.CRCD,D.TICD,D.VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_DBH_DTDT D,T07_REPORT R WHERE D.REPORTKEY=R.REPORTKEY
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
R.APPLICATION_NUM = #application_num#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_PACKET A,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP B WHERE A.REPORTORGANKEY=B.REPORT_ORGANKEY
PACKET_TYPE_CD = #packet_type_cd#
PACKET_FILENAME = #packet_filename#
REPORT_TYPE_CD = #report_type_cd#
B.ORGANKEY = #reportorgankey#
REPORTORGANKEY = #searchReportorgankey#
SENDDATE_CH = #senddate_ch#
SENDDATE_DT >= #start_dt:DATE#
SENDDATE_DT <= #end_dt:DATE#
BATCH_SEQ = #batch_seq#
PACKET_STATUS_CD = #packet_status_cd#

SELECT PACKETKEY,PACKET_TYPE_CD,REPORT_TYPE_CD,REPORTORGANKEY,SENDDATE_DT,BATCH_SEQ,PACKET_FILENAME,PACKET_FILEPATH,PACKET_STATUS_CD,ORIG_PACKETKEY,CREATE_DT,SENDDATE_CH FROM T07_PACKET A,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP B WHERE A.REPORTORGANKEY=B.REPORT_ORGANKEY
PACKET_TYPE_CD = #packet_type_cd#
PACKET_FILENAME = #packetkey#
REPORT_TYPE_CD = #report_type_cd#
B.ORGANKEY = #reportorgankey#
REPORTORGANKEY = #searchReportorgankey#
SENDDATE_CH = #senddate_ch#
BATCH_SEQ = #batch_seq#
PACKET_STATUS_CD = #packet_status_cd#
SENDDATE_DT >= #senddate_dt#
ORDER BY SENDDATE_DT
ORDER BY PACKETKEY
ORDER BY PACKET_TYPE_CD
ORDER BY REPORT_TYPE_CD
ORDER BY REPORTORGANKEY
ORDER BY SENDDATE_CH
ORDER BY BATCH_SEQ
DESC
DESC

SELECT PACKETKEY,PACKET_TYPE_CD,REPORT_TYPE_CD,REPORTORGANKEY,SENDDATE_DT,BATCH_SEQ,PACKET_FILENAME, PACKET_FILEPATH,PACKET_STATUS_CD,ORIG_PACKETKEY,CREATE_DT,SENDDATE_CH,ORIG_PACKET_FILENAME FROM T07_PACKET A,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP B WHERE A.REPORTORGANKEY=B.REPORT_ORGANKEY
PACKET_TYPE_CD = #packet_type_cd#
PACKET_FILENAME = #packet_filename#
B.ORGANKEY = #reportorgankey#
REPORT_TYPE_CD = #report_type_cd#
REPORTORGANKEY = #searchReportorgankey#
SENDDATE_CH = #senddate_ch#
SENDDATE_DT >= #start_dt:DATE#
SENDDATE_DT <= #end_dt:DATE#
BATCH_SEQ = #batch_seq#
PACKET_STATUS_CD = #packet_status_cd#
ORDER BY SENDDATE_DT
ORDER BY PACKETKEY
ORDER BY PACKET_TYPE_CD
ORDER BY REPORT_TYPE_CD
ORDER BY REPORTORGANKEY
ORDER BY SENDDATE_CH
ORDER BY BATCH_SEQ
DESC
DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_MSG T1,T07_PACKET T2 WHERE T1.PACKETKEY = T2.PACKETKEY AND T1.MSG_STATUS_CD ='3' AND T2.PACKETKEY=#value#

UPDATE T07_REPORT SET REPORT_STATUS_CD='3' WHERE REPORTKEY IN ( SELECT B.REPORTKEY FROM T07_MSG B,T07_PACKET C WHERE T07_REPORT.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND B.PACKETKEY = C.PACKETKEY AND C.PACKETKEY=#packetkey# )
DELETE FROM T07_MSG WHERE PACKETKEY=#value#
DELETE FROM T07_PACKET WHERE PACKETKEY=#value#

UPDATE T07_PACKET SET PACKETKEY=#packetkey#
PACKET_STATUS_CD = #packet_status_cd#
PACKET_FILEPATH = #packet_filepath#
SENDDATE_DT = #senddate_dt#
SENDDATE_CH = #senddate_ch#
BATCH_SEQ = #batch_seq#
PACKET_FILENAME = #packet_filename#
WHERE PACKETKEY=#packetkey#
UPDATE T07_PACKET SET PACKET_STATUS_CD = '3' WHERE PACKETKEY=#packetkey#
